greeting.welcome: Welcome to your AI-powered future, a hands-on workshop for curious students ready to explore the exciting world of artificial intelligence.

checklist.title: Can you see my screen?
checklist.description: Make sure audio and video are working perfectly for the best experience

checklist.title: Questions welcome anytime!
checklist.description: Pop your questions in the Q&A box‚Äîno question is too small or silly

checklist.title: Get ready for surprises
checklist.description: We'll keep this fun, interactive, and full of mind-blowing demos

response.intro: AI is shaping the future. By learning it now, you are preparing yourselves for amazing opportunities.
keyBenefits: Build a future career in technology üíº
response.tagline: You are the next generation of innovators!
response.description: Artificial intelligence isn't just changing the world‚Äîit's revolutionizing how you learn, create, and explore your potential. From supporting your projects to unleashing your artistic talents, AI makes learning faster, more engaging, and incredibly fun.

features.title: Smart Learning
features.description: AI supports your projects with intelligent assistance and creative insights

features.title: Creative Arts
features.description: Transform your artistic vision into stunning digital creations

features.title: Better Communication
features.description: Express your ideas more clearly and confidently than ever before

activities.title: AI Art Creation
activities.description: Design posters, illustrations, and digital artwork using AI-powered creative tools

activities.title: Story Generation
activities.description: Craft amazing stories, poems, and creative writing with AI as your co-author

activities.title: Coding Adventures
activities.description: Build simple programs and learn coding concepts with AI guidance and support

activities.title: Data Visualization
activities.description: Transform boring numbers into colorful, meaningful charts and infographics

response.intro: AI will be part of almost every job. Here are careers where AI plays a big role:

careers.title: AI Solution Architect
careers.description: They build the 'brains' behind AI ‚Äî teaching machines how to learn from data and make smart decisions.
careers.example: An AI solution Architect bridges the gap between business needs and technical teams.

careers.title: Data Scientist
careers.description: They find patterns in huge amounts of data and turn them into useful insights for companies, hospitals, or governments.
careers.example: A data scientist helps Netflix decide what shows to recommend to each user.

careers.title: Artist / Creative Technologist
careers.description: They combine art and technology to make digital art, music, or animations using AI tools.
careers.example: An AI artist uses tools like DALL¬∑E or Soundraw to create music videos or futuristic artwork.

careers.title: Robotics Engineer
careers.description: They design and program robots that can perform tasks like surgery, farming, or space exploration.
careers.example: A robotics engineer helps design robots used by NASA to explore Mars.

careers.title: Healthcare Analyst
careers.description: They use AI to help doctors detect diseases early or predict patient risks.
careers.example: An analyst develops an AI system that can detect signs of cancer from X-ray scans.

careers.title: Cybersecurity Analyst (AI Security)
careers.description: They use AI to protect computers, networks, and data from hackers.
careers.example: AI helps detect unusual login attempts or fake emails to keep people's data safe.

careers.title: AI Entrepreneur / Startup Founder
careers.description: They use AI to create new products, apps, or services that solve real-world problems. An AI entrepreneur combines creativity, coding, and business skills to build something original.
careers.example: A student builds an AI app that helps farmers predict rainfall or a chatbot that tutors children in rural schools.

careers.title: AI Product Manager
careers.description: They use AI to do end-to-end development and lifecycle of products that uses AI.
careers.example: AI helps in designing, developing and launching a product also enhances existing product.

careers.title: Environmental AI Scientist
careers.description: They use AI to solve environmental challenges like pollution, deforestation, and climate change.
careers.example: AI helps predict floods or monitor forest health through satellite images.

features.title: Digital Simulations
features.description: Run virtual experiments safely before entering the real lab. Test different variables and see results instantly.

features.title: Perfect Preparation
features.description: Practice procedures, learn safety protocols, and understand expected outcomes before handling actual chemicals.

features.title: Enhanced Understanding
features.description: Visualize molecular interactions, chemical bonds, and reactions at the atomic level for deeper comprehension.

features.title: Step-by-Step Solutions
features.description: Watch AI break down complex equations into manageable steps, explaining the logic behind each mathematical operation clearly and patiently.

features.title: Visual Explanations
features.description: Transform abstract mathematical concepts into interactive visual representations that make geometry, algebra, and calculus intuitive and engaging.
